item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "God has no religion." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Hate the sin, love the sinner." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by mahatma gandhi
item.description: "I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet." -- mahatma gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Sarah add a quote by ابوالقاسم فردوسی / Abolghasem Ferdowsi
item.description: "سر تخت شاهان بپیچد سه کار نخستین ز بیدادگر شهریار دگر آنکه بی مایه را برکشد ز مرد هنرمند برتر کشد سه دیگر که با گنج خویشی کند به دینار کوشد که بیشی کند" -- ابوالقاسم فردوسی / Abolghasem Ferdowsi

item.title: Sarah add a quote by علي شريعتي
item.description: "آنروز که همه به دنبال چشمان زیبا هستند تو به دنبال نگاه زیبا باش" -- علي شريعتي

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Ali Shariati
item.description: "در دردها دوست را خبر نکردن خود یک نوع عشق ورزیدن است" -- Ali Shariati

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jostein Gaarder
item.description: "How terribly sad it was that people are made in such a way that they get used to something as extraordinary as living." -- Jostein Gaarder

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jostein Gaarder
item.description: "As long as we are children, we have the ability to experience things around us--but then we grow used to the world. To grow up is to get drunk on sensory experience." -- Jostein Gaarder

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jostein Gaarder
item.description: "A joker is a little fool who is different from everyone else. He's not a club, diamond, heart, or spade. He's not an eight or a nine, a king or a jack. He is an outsider. He is placed in the same pack as the other cards, but he doesn't belong there. Therefore, he can be removed without anybody missing him." -- Jostein Gaarder

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jostein Gaarder
item.description: "Our lives are part of a unique adventure... Nevertheless, most of us think the world is 'normal' and are constantly hunting for something abnormal--like angels or Martians. But that is just because we don't realize the world is a mystery. As for myself, I felt completely different. I saw the world as an amazing dream. I was hunting for some kind of explanation of how everything fit together." -- Jostein Gaarder

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jostein Gaarder
item.description: "Life is both sad and solemn. We are led into a wonderful world, we meet one another here, greet each other---and wander together for a brief moment. Then we lose each other and disappear as suddenly and unreasonably as we arrived." -- Jostein Gaarder
